name: Raga_Bua
content:
Raga Bua was a Kyuzo that served as the guildmaster for the Bounty Hunters' Guild on Batuu.
Raga Bua was introduced as part of the Star Wars: Batuu Bounty Hunters game that debuted at Walt Disney World's Star Wars: Galaxy's Edge in the summer of 2022.
Raga Bua's role in the game is to reward guests after they've tracked down their assigned bounties, with their face peeking through a slot on the door of the guild's headquarters.
